name: VIRTUE (X-E-A)
description:
Follow the life of an Idea as it begins its journey through the collective human consciousness.

VIRTUE is a platformer game I've designed using the open source Godot Engine. A large portion of its assets have been created by digitizing my physical art pieces using stop-motion animation. 

With a play-time of around 40-60 minutes, this demo is intended to establish a framework I can expand upon in the future, while still giving the player a fulfilling play-through. 

Thanks for playing!
XEA
